EmailTemplate.description: Notification should be generated when 'Productization' checkbox is selected. This indicates that the Service Type is Productization and Productization Team has to update the BX009
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: BX009 having Productization Service Type
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has a Productization Service Type
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has a Productization Service Type. Please update the BX009 with Productization specific details. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
